commentBody: The statement by Trump is about the only thing he has said that I can agree with. With timeouts a game can run for around 2 hours – the actual amount of play? About 15 minutes. Take away the instant replays, endless postering and milling around on the sidelines, peripheral razzle-dazzle and the Gatorade soak, at its core, football as it is eupemistically called, is a joke.
